desc: Performed CMPM-based performance monitoring to evaluate customer creditworthiness by analyzing scorecard behavior over time using PySpark, SAS, and key performance metrics such as AUROC, PSI, and stability indices, enabling data-driven risk decisions.
Supported the generation of CMPM reports and integrated model performance outputs into Tableau dashboards, streamlining quarterly executive reporting and reducing manual effort by 40%.
Collaborated cross-functionally with QRM and Risk Data Solutions teams to standardize data pipelines using ETL processes, enhancing data accuracy and decision-making consistency.
Transitioned analytics from SAS to PySpark, cutting costs by 50% and boosting processing efficiency.
Led a team of 10+ professionals, ensuring on-time deliverables in high-pressure environments.
Drove 100% client satisfaction by delivering data insights aligned with business goals through stakeholder collaboration.
Boosted fraud detection efficiency by 50% by developing automated Python and SQL data pipelines.
Digitized risk assessments for Fortune 500 firms, cutting manual effort by 50% while expanding scope.
Built an automated GST reconciliation system using Python, resolving GSTR-1 & GSTR-2A mismatches with Fuzzy Wuzzy and Gestalt algorithms.
Enhanced GST claim accuracy by implementing advanced string-matching and attribute similarity checks, reducing reporting errors.
Streamlined tax compliance by automating manual reconciliation, improving efficiency and minimizing discrepancies in financial data.
